name: Mammalfish
tag_list: mobile, gaming, gamification, interactive, creative, branding, advertising, consulting, web, development, kinect, education, family, social
overview:
Mammalfish is a boutique firm with more than 13 years experience in creative and interactive, focused on family and education brands.

It’s due to our experience and size that we have the ability to stay ahead of trends, bringing our clients the freshest strategies for mobile, web, social, and live interactive campaigns.

Mammalfish is proud to be an award-winning firm founded in 1998 in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. We’re dedicated to “Face Time” with our clients. We design and develop creative solutions which motivate people to act! Our team is comprised of artists, strategists, technologists and philanthropists .
